About NPA

We are an IB high school in Humboldt County, California.
NEWSWEEK rated Northcoast Preparatory and Performing Arts Academy the 3rd best high school in California, and 30th in the USA on the America's Top Public High Schools 2009 list.

#21 Northcoast Prep and Performing Arts Academy
